ComicInfo.Title: Party Favor; Rhiannon; Crystal Quest; Pirate Treasure

ComicInfo.Writer: Brian Sutton,Elin Winkler,Tabitha R. Jones,Scamp,Dashe,Brian Sutton,Elin Winkler,Tabitha R. Jones,Scamp,Dashe
ComicInfo.Penciller: Shon Howell,Jeremy Bernal,Diana Sprinkle,Scamp,Dashe,Shon Howell,Jeremy Bernal,Diana Sprinkle,Scamp,Dashe
ComicInfo.Summary:
Party Favor: The Mistress takes Amy with her to a costume party. While The Mistress is busy playing with an oversexed Count, Amy gets seduced by a brazen unicorn.
Rhiannon: Rhiannon, a vampire unicorn, seduces a pretty waitress at a nightclub for a night of sex and feeding.
Crystal Quest: Princess Cryseis, in search of the mystic unicorn crystal, consults Mahamet the Oracle as to its location. Mahamet's information, though, has a price: Three months servitude from Princess Cryseis.
Pirate Treasure: A maiden traveling aboard a ship is taken advantage of by the female captain and her crew.
ComicInfo.Characters: Amy the slave girl,Illja,Count Tony,The Mistress
